Row.Text: Blessings be upon you, Princess Loolilalu of the Candy Canyon Kingdom. We thank the stars above that we have you as our leader, Your Highness! Your domain stands as a beacon of light among the pastel pink plains, welcoming many visitors to partake in the peaceful environment you have fostered. With your suave diplomacy, the area has remained tranquil for as long as you can remember. Your decisions have led to the Kingdom being the local powerhouse of commerce and culture that it is today.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]That was until one day, when you heard wails of panic erupting from the city centre. Bursting out of your study to investigate, you realise the Candy Canyon is gone. There is a lush environment now surrounding your walls. Boundless green plains, unbelievably tall plant life, the sight of ruins dotting the landscape. Your spell of gazing into the distance is cut short, as your guards alert you to unknown foes approaching from the south, wielding weaponry never before seen in your delectable, delicious homeland.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Noble princess, the Kingdom seeks your guidance. The wall must hold. Are you capable of repelling this unforeseen threat to your people? Can your despondent subjects count on their humble sovereign to protect them? Can you build a civilization that stands the test of time?

Upon studying Philosophy, gain +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from [ICON_RES_SUGAR] Sugar, [ICON_RES_COCOA] Cocoa, [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus, [ICON_RES_SPICES] Spice and [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana tiles. Temples provide +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
Constructs a Maple Sugarbush, which increases the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_GOLD] Gold provided by this tile.

The War Rig excels in positioning, having more [ICON_MOVES] Movement than the Cavalry, which it replaces. It may also perform a one-time Eclair Delivery to earn Gold and XP. May only be built by the Candy Canyon Kingdom.

A delivery truck re-purposed for the war effort. This unit provides the Eclair Delivery promotion, has extra movement, and a lower combat strength compared to the Cavalry, which it replaces. This unit does not require Horses - instead, the War Rig is fuelled by maple syrup.
The War Rig carries an Eclair as cargo. May Sell the Eclair when adjacent to a foreign tile to gain [ICON_GOLD] Gold and XP based on distance from capital, but only once.
